K12bsu012_u:5: ekasmin samaye bhagavān janapadacaryāṃ caramāṇo 'nupūrveṇa yena vaiśālī mahānagarī tenānuprāpto 'bhūt /
K12bsu012_u:6: tatra khalu bhagavān vaiśālyāṃ viharati sma vādyasvaravṛkṣamūle mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena
K12bsu012_u:7: sārdham aṣṭabhirbikṣusahasraiḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadbhiś ca bodhisattvasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ rājāmātyabrāhmaṇagṛhapatisaṃhatyā
K12bsu012_u:10: atha khalu mañjuśrīr dharmarājaputro buddhānubhāvenotthāyāsanād ekaṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ
K12bsu012_u:11: kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya
K12bsu012_u:12: bhagavantam etad avocat - deśayatu bhagavaṃs teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ nāmāni,
K12bsu012_u:14: vayaṃ śrutvā sarvakarmāvaraṇāni viśodhayema paścime kāle paścime samaye saddharmapratirūpake vartamāne sattvānām anugraham upādāya /
K12bsu012_u:15: atha bhagavān mañjuśriye kumārabhūtāya sādhukāram adāt - sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ,
K12bsu012_u:18: nānākarmāvaraṇenāvṛtānāṃ sattvānām arthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇāṃ ca hitārthāya /
K12bsu012_u:20: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye /
K12bsu012_u:24: asti mañjuśrīḥ pūrvasmin digbhāge ito buddhakṣetrād daśagaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇy atikramya vaidūryanirbhāsā nāma lokadhātuḥ /
K12bsu012_u:25: tatra bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabho nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho viharati vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ
K12bsu012_u:26: sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiś ca śāstā devānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
K12bsu012_u:27: tasya khalu punar mañjuśrīḥ bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ carata imāni dvādaśa mahāpraṇidhānāny abhūvan /
K12bsu012_u:29: prathamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt yadāham anāgate 'dhvani anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeyam,
K12bsu012_u:30: tadā mama śarīraprabhayā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇā lokadhātavo bhrājeraṃs tapyeran viroceran /
K12bsu012_u:34: (dvitīyaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate 'dhvani anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyeyam,
K12bsu012_u:35: tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me kāyaḥ anarghavaidūryamaṇir iva antarbahiratyantapariśuddho vimalaprabhāsaṃpannaḥ syāt /
K12bsu012_u:36: vipulakāyas tadupamena śriyā tejasā ca pratyupasthitaḥ syāt /
K12bsu012_u:37: tasyāṃśujālāni raviśaśikarānatikrameyuḥ te ca ye kecit sattvā lokadhātau jātāś ca,
K12bsu012_u:40: sarvadikṣu mama ābhayāṃ spṛṣṭāḥ kuśalāni ca)
K12bsu012_u:43: yadāham anāgate - - - - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye sattvā aprameyaprajñopāyabalādhānena aparimāṇasya sattvadhātor akṣayāyopabhogāya paribhogāya syuḥ /
K12bsu012_u:44: kasyaci(t) sattvasya kenacid vaikalyaṃ na syāt //
K12bsu012_u:45: caturthaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāpto 'haṃ ye kumārgapratipannāḥ sattvāḥ śrāvakamārgapratipannāḥ pratyekabuddhamārgapratipannāś
K12bsu012_u:46: te sattvā anuttare bodhimārge mahāyāne niyojayeran //
K12bsu012_u:47: pañcamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye sattvā mama śāsane brahmacaryaṃ careyuḥ,
K12bsu012_u:51: mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā kvacid durgatigamanaṃ syāt //
K12bsu012_u:52: ṣaṣṭhaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya ca
K12bsu012_u:53: me ye sattvā hīnakāyā vikalendriyā durvarṇā jaḍaiḍamūkā laṃgāḥ kubjāḥ śvitrāḥ kuṇḍā
K12bsu012_u:54: andhā badhirā unmattā ye cānye śarīrasthavyādhayaḥ,
K12bsu012_u:55: te mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā sarve sakalendriyāḥ suparipūrṇagātrā bhaveyuḥ //
K12bsu012_u:56: saptamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya
K12bsu012_u:57: ca me ye nānāvyādhiparipīḍitāḥ sattvā atrāṇā aśaraṇā bhaiṣajyopakaraṇavirahitā anāthā
K12bsu012_u:61: nīrogāś ca nirupadravāś ca te syur yāva bodhiparyavasānam //
K12bsu012_u:62: aṣṭamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā yaḥ kaścin mātṛgrāmo
K12bsu012_u:63: nānāśtrīdoṣaśataiḥ saṃkliṣṭaṃ strībhāvaṃ vijugupsitaṃ mātṛgrāmayoniṃ ca parimoktukāmo
K12bsu012_u:65: tasya mātṛgrāmasya na strībhāvo bhavet yāva bodhiparyavasānam //
K12bsu012_u:66: navamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāpte 'haṃ
K12bsu012_u:68: vinivartya samyagdṛṣṭau niyojya ānupūrveṇa bodhisattvacārikāṃ saṃdarśayeyam //
K12bsu012_u:69: daśamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūta - - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye kecit sattvā rājādhibhayabhītāḥ,
K12bsu012_u:70: ye vā bandhanabaddhāvaruddhāḥ vadhārhā anekamāyābhir upadrutā vimānitāś ca kāyikavācikacaitasikaduḥkhairabhyāhatāḥ,
K12bsu012_u:71: te mama nāmadheyasya śravaṇena madīyena puṇyānubhāvena ca sarvabhayopadravebhyaḥ parimucyeran //
K12bsu012_u:72: ekādaśamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūta - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya
K12bsu012_u:73: ca me ye sattvāḥ kṣudhāgninā prajvalitāḥ āhārapānaparyeṣṭyabhiyuktāḥ tannidānaṃ pāpaṃ kurvanti, sace(t)
K12bsu012_u:75: ahaṃ teṣāṃ varṇagandharasopetena āhāreṇa śarīraṃ saṃtarpayeyam //
K12bsu012_u:76: dvādaśamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānam abhūt - yadāham anāgate - - - tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye kecit sattvā vasanavirahitā daridrāḥ śītoṣṇadaṃśamaśakrairupadrutā
K12bsu012_u:82: imāni dvādaśa mahāpraṇidhānāni mañjuśrīḥ bhagavān bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvaṃ bodhicārikāṃ caran kṛtavān
K12bsu012_u:83: tasya khalu punar mañjuśrīḥ bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya
K12bsu012_u:84: yat praṇidhānaṃ yac ca buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaṃ tan na śakyaṃ kalpena vā kalpāvaśeṣeṇa vā kṣapayitum /
K12bsu012_u:85: suviśuddhaṃ tad buddhakṣetraṃ vyapagataśilāśarkarakaṭhalyam apagatakāmadoṣam apagatāpāyaduḥkhaśabdam apagatamātṛgrāmam /
K12bsu012_u:88: tatra vaidūryanirbhāsāyāṃ lokadhātau dvau bodhisattvau mahāsattvau teṣām aprameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pramukhau,
K12bsu012_u:91: yau tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya saddharmakośaṃ dhārayataḥ /
K12bsu012_u:92: tasmāt tarhi mañjuśrīḥ śrāddhena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tatra buddhakṣetropapattaye praṇidhānaṃ karaṇīyam //
K12bsu012_u:93: punaraparaṃ bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam āmantrayate sma - santi mañjuśrīḥ pṛthagjanāḥ sattvāḥ,
K12bsu012_u:95: te lobhābhibhūtā ajānanto dānaṃ dānasya ca mahāvipākam,
K12bsu012_u:97: na ca dānasaṃvibhāge teṣāṃ cittaṃ kramate /
K12bsu012_u:98: dānakāle upasthite svaśarīramaṃsacchedane iva vā manaso (duḥkhaṃ) bhavati /
K12bsu012_u:99: aneke ca sattvāḥ ye svayam eva na paribhuñjanti,
K12bsu012_u:103: te tādṛśāḥ sattvā itaś cyutvā pretaloke upapatsyante tiryagyonau vā /
K12bsu012_u:104: yaiḥ pūrvaṃ manuṣyabhūtaiḥ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyam,
K12bsu012_u:105: tatra teṣāṃ yamalokasthitānāṃ tiryagyonisthitānāṃ vā tasya tathāgatasya nāma su(saṃ?)
K12bsu012_u:107: saha smaraṇamātreṇa ataś cyutvā punar api manuṣyaloke upapatsyante,
K12bsu012_u:109: te te durgatibhayabhītā na bhūyaḥ kāmaguṇebhir arthikā bhaviṣyanti,
K12bsu012_u:110: dānābhiratāś ca bhaviṣyanti dānasya ca varṇavādinaḥ /
K12bsu012_u:111: sarvam api parityāgenānupūrveṇa karacaraṇaśīrṣanayanaṃ ca māṃsaśoṇitaṃ (ca)
K12bsu012_u:114: punar aparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ santi sattvāḥ ye tathāgatānuddiśya śikṣāpadāni dhārayanti,
K12bsu012_u:120: na ca tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ gambhīram artham ājānanti /
K12bsu012_u:124: mārapakṣikās te tādṛḥā mohapuruṣāḥ svayaṃ kumārgapratipannāḥ /
K12bsu012_u:126: teṣām evaṃrūpāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ bhūyiṣṭhena narakavāsagatir bhaviṣyati /
K12bsu012_u:128: yais tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ ḥrutaṃ bhaviṣyanti,
K12bsu012_u:129: teṣāṃ tatra narake sthitānāṃ buddhānubhāvena tasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ sumukhībhaviṣyati /
K12bsu012_u:130: te tataḥ cyutvā punar api manuṣyaloke upapatsyante samyagdṛṣṭisaṃpannā vīryavantaḥ kalyāṇāḥayāḥ /
K12bsu012_u:131: te gṛhān utsṛjya tathāgataḥāsane pravrajitvā ānupūrveṇa bodhisattvacārikāṃ paripūrayiṣyanti //
K12bsu012_u:132: punar aparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ santi sattvāḥ ye ātmano varṇaṃ bhāṣante matsariṇaḥ,
K12bsu012_u:134: ātmotkarṣakaparapaṃsakāḥ sattvāḥ parasparasatkṛtvāḥ tryapāyeṣu bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi duḥkham anubhaviṣyanti /
K12bsu012_u:135: te anekavarṣasahasrāṇām atyayena tataś cyutvā gavāśvoṣṭragardabhādiṣu tiryagyoniṣu upapadyante /
K12bsu012_u:136: kaśādaṇḍaprahāreṇa tāḍitāḥ kṣuttarṣapīḍitaśarīrā mahāntaṃ bhāraṃ vahamānā mārgaṃ gacchanti /
K12bsu012_u:140: yaiḥ pūrvaṃ manuṣyabhūtais tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati,
K12bsu012_u:142: tīkṣṇendriyāś ca bhaviṣyanti paṇḍitā vyaktā meghāvinaś ca /
K12bsu012_u:147: punar aparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ santi sattvāḥ ye paiśunyābhiratāḥ sattvānāṃ parasparaṃ kalahavigrahavivādān kārāpayanti /
K12bsu012_u:148: te parasparaṃ vigrahacittāḥ sattvā nānāvidhamakuśalam abhisaṃskurvanti kāyena vācā manasā,
K12bsu012_u:149: anyonyam ahitakāmā nityaṃ parasparam anarthāya parākrāmanti /
K12bsu012_u:150: te ca vanadevatām āvāhayanti vṛkṣadevatāṃ giridevatāṃ ca /
K12bsu012_u:154: tasya śatror nāma vā śarīrapratimāṃ vā kṛtvā tatra ghoravidyāṃ sādhayanti kākhordavetālānuprayogeṇa jīvitāntarāyaṃ vā śarīravināśaṃ vā kartukāmāḥ
K12bsu012_u:155: yaiḥ punas tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati,
K12bsu012_u:157: sarve ca te parasparaṃ maitracittā hitacittā avyāpannacittāś ca viharanti svakasvakena parigraheṇa saṃtuṣṭāḥ //
K12bsu012_u:158: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ etāś catasraḥ parṣado bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāḥ,
K12bsu012_u:159: ye cānye śrāddhāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā āryāṣṭāṅgaiḥ samanvāgatā upavāsam upavasanti,
K12bsu012_u:160: ekavārṣikaṃ vā traimāsikaṃ vā śikṣāpadaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
K12bsu012_u:161: yeṣām evaṃpraṇidhānam evamabhiprāyam - anena vayaṃ kuśalamūlena paścimāyāṃ diśi sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau upapadyema yatrāmitāyus tathāgataḥ /
K12bsu012_u:162: yaiḥ punas tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati,
K12bsu012_u:163: teṣāṃ maraṇakālasamaye aṣṭau bodhisattvā ṛddhyāgatā upadarśayanti,
K12bsu012_u:169: te tataś cyutvā iha manuṣyaloke upapatsyante /
K12bsu012_u:171: te anekāni sattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyanti /
K12bsu012_u:172: apare punaḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣu brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣu prabhūtadhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgārasamṛddheṣu ca kuleṣu upapatsyante /
K12bsu012_u:176: yaś ca mātṛgrāmaḥ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā ca udgrahīṣyati,
K12bsu012_u:177: tasya sa eva paścimaḥ strībhāvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ //
K12bsu012_u:178: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantam etad avocat - ahaṃ bhagavan paścime
K12bsu012_u:179: kāle paścime samaye teṣāṃ śrāddhānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca tasya bhagavato
K12bsu012_u:181: antaśaḥ svapnāntaram api buddhanāmakaṃ karṇapuṭeṣu upasaṃhārayiṣyāmi /
K12bsu012_u:182: ye idaṃ sūtraratnaṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
K12bsu012_u:186: tat pañcaraṅgikavastraiḥ pariveṣṭya śucau pradeśe sthāpayitavyam /
K12bsu012_u:189: anyāni ca anekāni ca devakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi upasaṃkramiṣyanti /
K12bsu012_u:191: te ca bhagavan idaṃ sūtraratnaṃ prakāśayiṣyanti /
K12bsu012_u:192: tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūrvapraṇidhānaviśeṣavistaravibhāgaṃ ca tasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
K12bsu012_u:195: hṛtaṃ vā ojaḥ punar api pratisaṃharati /
K12bsu012_u:199: yaś ca mañjuśrīḥ śrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tasya tathāgatasya pūjāṃ kartukāmaḥ,
K12bsu012_u:202: śucinā śucim āhāraṃ kṛtvā śucau pradeśe (nānāpuṣpāṇi saṃstārya nānāgandhapradhūpite
K12bsu012_u:206: nānātūryasaṃgītipravāditena sā tathāgatapratimā pradakṣiṇīkartavyā tasya tathāgatasya pūrṇapraṇidhānāni manasi kartavyāni /
K12bsu012_u:220: yatra vāyasaḥ sthito bhavati durnimittaṃ vā,
K12bsu012_u:222: tais tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūjā kartavyā /
K12bsu012_u:229: punar aparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ ye śrāddhāḥ kulaputrā va kuladuhitaro vā ye yāvajjīvaṃ triśaraṇam upagṛhṇanti,
K12bsu012_u:236: ye ca yathāparigṛhītāc chikṣāsaṃvarād anyatarāc chikṣāpadāt bhraṣṭā bhavanti saced durgatibhayabhītāḥ,
K12bsu012_u:237: tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayeyuḥ,
K12bsu012_u:239: yaś ca mātṛgrāmaḥ prasavanakāle tīvrāṃ duḥkhāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayati,
K12bsu012_u:240: yā tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyam anusmaret,
K12bsu012_u:244: janayiṣyati abhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyas tīkṣṇendriyo buddhimān /
K12bsu012_u:246: na ca śakyate amanuṣyais tasya ojo 'pahartum //
K12bsu012_u:247: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma - śraddadhāsi tvam ānanda
K12bsu012_u:248: pattīyasi yad ahaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ
K12bsu012_u:250: athavā te kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā atra gambhīre buddhagocare?
K12bsu012_u:251: athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat - na me bhadanta bhagavan atra kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā tathāgatabhāṣiteṣu sūtrānteṣu /
K12bsu012_u:254: imau bhagavan candrasūryau evaṃ maharddhikau evaṃ mahānubhāvau pṛthivyāṃ prapatetām,
K12bsu012_u:255: sa sumerur vā parvatarājaḥ sthānāc calet,
K12bsu012_u:256: na tu buddhānāṃ vacanam anyathā bhavet /
K12bsu012_u:257: kiṃ tu bhadanta santi sattvāḥ śraddhendriyavikalāḥ /
K12bsu012_u:258: idaṃ buddhagocaraṃ śrutvāṃ evaṃ vakṣyanti katham etan nāmadheyasmaraṇamātreṇa tasya tathāgatasya tāvanto guṇānuśaṃsā bhavanti?
K12bsu012_u:261: teṣāṃ dīrgharātram anarthāya na hitāya na sukhāya vinipātāy bhaviṣyati /
K12bsu012_u:269: abhūmir atra sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ sthāpayitvā ekajātipratibaddhān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān iti /
K12bsu012_u:273: tasya bhagavatas tathāgatasya bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya ānanda bodhisattvacaryām apramāṇam,
K12bsu012_u:276: ākāṅkṣamāṇo 'haṃ tasya tathāgatasya kalpaṃ vā (BhgSū, Vaidya 171)
K12bsu012_u:279: na tv eva śakyaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūrvapraṇidhānaviśeṣavistarāntam adhigantum //
K12bsu012_u:280: tena khalu punaḥ samayena tasyām eva parṣadi trāṇamukto nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃnipatito 'bhūt saṃniṣaṇṇaḥ /
K12bsu012_u:281: utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya
K12bsu012_u:282: yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat - bhaviṣyanti bhadanta
K12bsu012_u:283: bhagavan sattvāḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye nānāvyādhiparipīḍitā dīrghavyādhinā (kṣīṇagātrāḥ)
K12bsu012_u:284: kṣuttarṣābhyāṃ śuṣkakaṇṭhoṣṭhā maraṇābhimukhā rorudyamānebhir mitrajñātisālohitaiḥ parivāritā andhakārāṃ diśaṃ paśyanto yamapuruṣair ākarṣyamāṇāś ca /
K12bsu012_u:285: tasya kalevare mañcaśayite vijñānaṃ yamasya dharmarājasyāgratām upanīyate /
K12bsu012_u:286: yac ca tasya sattvasya sahajānubaddham eva yat kiṃcit tena puruṣeṇa kuśalam akuśalaṃ vā kṛtaṃ bhavati,
K12bsu012_u:287: tat sarvaṃ sulikhitaṃ kṛtvā yamasya dharmarājasya upanāmyate /
K12bsu012_u:289: gaṇayati yathākṛtaṃ cāsya kuśalam akuśalaṃ vā tathājñāmājñāpayati /
K12bsu012_u:290: tatra ye te mitrajñātisālohitāstasyāturasyārthāya taṃ bhagavantaṃ bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhaṃ tathāgataṃ śaraṇaṃ gaccheyuḥ,
K12bsu012_u:292: sthānam etad vidyate yat tasya tad vijñānaṃ punar api pratinivarteta,
K12bsu012_u:294: yadi vā saptame divase yadi vā (ekaviṃśatime)
K12bsu012_u:295: divase yadi vā pañcatriṃśatime divase yadi vā ekonapañcāśatime divase tasya vijñānaṃ punar api nivarteta,
K12bsu012_u:297: tasya kuśalam akuśalaṃ vā karmavipākaṃ svayam eva pratyakṣaṃ bhavati /
K12bsu012_u:298: jñātvā sa jīvitahetau na kadāpi pāpam akuśalaṃ karma kariṣyati /
K12bsu012_u:299: tasmāc chrāddhena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitā vā tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūjā kartavyā //
K12bsu012_u:300: athāyuṣmān ānandas trāṇamuktaṃ nāma bodhisattvam etad avocat - kathaṃ kulaputra tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya pūjā kartavyā?
K12bsu012_u:301: trāṇamukto bodhisattva āha - ye bhadanta ānanda mahato vyādhitaḥ parimocitukāmāḥ,
K12bsu012_u:302: tais tasyāturasyārthāya sapta divasāni āryāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatam upavāsam upavasitavyam,
K12bsu012_u:303: bhikṣusaṃghasya ca āhārapānaiḥ sarvopakaraṇair yathāśakti pūjopasthānaṃ kartavyam /
K12bsu012_u:304: bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya nāmadheyaṃ triṣkṛtvā rātryāṃ triṣkṛtvā divase manasi kartavyam /
K12bsu012_u:308: ekaikayā pratimayā sapta sapta dīpāḥ prajvālayitavyāḥ /
K12bsu012_u:310: yadi ekonacatvāriṃśatime divase āloko na kṣīyate,
K12bsu012_u:313: punar aparaṃ bhadanta ānanda yeṣāṃ rājñāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktānām upadravā vā upasargā vā pratyupasthitā bhaveyuḥ,
K12bsu012_u:314: vyādhipīḍā vā svacakrapīḍā vā paracakrapīḍā vā nakṣatrapīḍā (BhgSū, Vaidya 172)
K12bsu012_u:315: vā candragrahasūryagrahapīḍā vā akālavātavṛṣṭipīḍā vā avagrahapīḍā vā samutthitā,
K12bsu012_u:316: amāṅgalyā vā saṃkrāmakavyādhir vā vipad vā samupasthitā,
K12bsu012_u:317: tena rājñā kṣatriyeṇa mūrdhābhiṣiktena sarvasattveṣu maitracittena bhavitavyam,
K12bsu012_u:319: tasya ca bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya yathāpūrvoktapūjā karaṇīyā /
K12bsu012_u:320: tadā tasya rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya etena kuśalamūlena ca tasya bhagavato
K12bsu012_u:324: sarve ca viṣayanivāsinaḥ sattvā ārogāḥ sukhitāḥ pramodyabahulāḥ /
K12bsu012_u:325: na ca tatra viṣaye duṣṭayakṣarākṣasabhūtapiśācāḥ sattvānāṃ viheṭhayanti /
K12bsu012_u:327: tasya ca rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya āyurvarṇabalārogyaiśvaryābhivṛddhir bhaviṣyati //
K12bsu012_u:328: athāyuṣmān ānandas trāṇamuktaṃ bodhisattvam evam avocat - kathaṃ kulaputra parikṣīṇāyuḥ punar evābhivivardhate?
K12bsu012_u:329: trāṇamukto bodhisattva āha - nanu tvayā bhadanta ānanda tathāgatasyāntikāc chrutam - santi akālamaraṇāni /
K12bsu012_u:338: caturtham akālamaraṇaṃ ye agnidāhena kālaṃ kurvanti /
K12bsu012_u:339: pañcamaṃ cākālamaraṇaṃ ye ca udakena mriyante /
K12bsu012_u:344: navamam akālamaraṇaṃ ye kṣuttṛṣopahatā āhārapānam alabhamānā ārtāḥ kālaṃ kurvanti /
K12bsu012_u:347: atha khalu tatra parṣadi dvādaśa mahāyakṣasenāpatayaḥ saṃnipatitā abhūvan yaduta kiṃbhīro nāma mahāyakṣasenāpatiḥ,
K12bsu012_u:359: ete dvādaśa mahāyakṣasenāpatayaḥ ekaikānucaraparivāritā ekakaṇṭhena bhagavantam evam
K12bsu012_u:360: āhuḥ - śrutam asmābhiś ca bhagavatā buddhānubhāvena tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya
K12bsu012_u:363: te vayaṃ sahitāḥ samagrā yāvajjīvaṃ buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmaḥ,
K12bsu012_u:366: sarvasattvānām arthāya hitāya sukhāya autsukyaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
K12bsu012_u:368: nagare vā janapade vā araṇyāyatene vā edaṃ sūtraṃ pracārayiṣyati,
K12bsu012_u:369: yo vā tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayiṣyati,
K12bsu012_u:375: atha khalu bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ yakṣasenāpatīnāṃ sādhukāram adāt - sādhu sādhu mahāyakṣasenāpatayaḥ,
K12bsu012_u:376: yad yūyaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya kṛtajñatām anusmaramāṇānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ hitāya pratipannāḥ //
K12bsu012_u:377: athāyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat - ko nāmāyaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyaḥ?
K12bsu012_u:379: bhagavān āha - tena hi ānanda dharmaparyāyam idaṃ bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūrvapraṇidhānaviśeṣavistaram iti dhāraya,
K12bsu012_u:389: sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan //
